refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: In Zeitgeist terminology, a subject is something (a file, web page, person, conversation, etc.) that was somehow involved or affected by a ZeitgeistEvent.

refsect2.title: zeitgeist_subject_matches_template ()
refsect2.para: true if this Subject matches *subject_template*. Empty fields in the template are treated as wildcards. Interpretations and manifestations are also matched if they are children of the types specified in subject_template.

refsect2.title: zeitgeist_subject_new_full ()
refsect2.para: Create a new Subject structure with predefined data

entry.para:
.
The URI or URL of the subject .

.
The interpretation type of the subject. .

.
The manifestation type of the subject. .

.
The mimetype of the subject. Eg. <emphasis>text/plain</emphasis> .

.
A small textual representation of the subject suitable for display .

.
String identifier for the storage medium the subject is on. .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A newly create zeitgeist_subject_new() instance. The returned subject will have a floating reference which will be consumed if you pass the event to any of the methods provided by this library (like adding it to an event).

refsect2.title: zeitgeist_subject_new_move_event ()
refsect2.para: Create a new Subject structure to describe a move event

entry.para:
.
The URI or URL of the subject .

.
The URI or URL of the subject .

.
The URI or URL of the subject .

.
The URI or URL of the subject .

.
The interpretation type of the subject. .

.
The manifestation type of the subject. .

.
The mimetype of the subject. Eg. <emphasis>text/plain</emphasis> .

.
A small textual representation of the subject suitable for display .

.
String identifier for the storage medium the subject is on. .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A newly create zeitgeist_subject_new() instance. The returned subject will have a floating reference which will be consumed if you pass the event to any of the methods provided by this library (like adding it to an event).

refsect2.title: zeitgeist_subject_new_from_variant ()
refsect2.para: Create a new Subject structure from predefined GVariant data

entry.para:
.
A GVariant decscribing the subject data. .
location to store the error occurring, or NULL to ignore.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A newly create zeitgeist_subject_new() instance. The returned subject will have a floating reference which will be consumed if you pass the event to any of the methods provided by this library (like adding it to an event).

refsect2.title: zeitgeist_subject_get_uri ()
refsect2.para: Get and return the current value of the "uri" property.

refsect2.title: zeitgeist_subject_set_uri ()
refsect2.para: Set the value of the "uri" property to value .

entry.para: the new value of the "uri" property

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistSubject
refsect2.para: In Zeitgeist terminology, a subject is something (a file, web page, person, conversation, etc.) that was somehow involved or affected by a ZeitgeistEvent.

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistSubjectClass
refsect2.para: The class structure for ZEITGEIST_TYPE_SUBJECT. All the fields in this structure are private and should never be accessed directly.
